specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Non-chlorine bleach when needed, for whites only Tumble dry normal low heat Iron on low heat on reverse side if needed Sustainability Certification > GRS The Global Recycled Standard is a voluntary product standard for tracking and verifying the content of recycled materials in a final product. The standard applies to the full supply chain and addresses traceability, environmental principles, social requirements, chemical content and labeling. Eco-fiber > Recycled Yarn Recycled yarn is a special type of yarn manufactured from waste textiles and other materials. This kind of yarn is created from waste materials, such as plastic bottles, as well as 'textile-to-textile' waste. Recommended Use T-shirts
